Gettting Started

= Introduction =

The distribution includes a basic "helloworld" sample under the "samples" directory that you can use as a starting point for your project. 

*You must use GWT 1.5.3 (or greater).* Earlier versions of GWT are not supported.

Several tutorials for setting up common development tools (Eclipse, NetBeans, etc) are available as sticky threads on the [http://forums.smartclient.com/forumdisplay.php?f=14 SmartGWT Forums].  This is also the best place to ask technical questions.
